events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's application was categorised under Engineering after identifying relevant keywords related to software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the Software Engineer opening and to communicate next steps to the candidate.
Conducted the initial screening call to assess the candidate's background in software engineering and their motivation for applying.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from the candidate confirming their availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 10 AM, focusing on coding skills and system design.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
Scheduled the HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and to answer any questions the candidate may have.
The HR interview was completed smoothly, with the candidate expressing great enthusiasm for joining the engineering team.
An official offer for the Software Engineer role was proposed to the candidate, including salary and benefits details.
Received positive feedback from the candidate regarding the offer and their eagerness to move forward in the process.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date, marking a successful conclusion to the recruitment process.
Onboarding activities have commenced for the new Software Engineer, including setup of accounts and introduction to the development team.
The hiring process is officially closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering department.
